note.p: American autograph hunter. Clerk in a store in Brooklyn, New York, 1880. Bank accountant in Pueblo, Colorado, 1900.
United States Federal Census 1880 (Brooklyn, Kings, New York 083/181D), 1900 (Pueblo, Pueblo, Colorado 94/5) (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 November 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 November 2020)
